text.div:
SHR GeneIdentifierVS ValueSet

A unique code for a gene, including protein coding genes, ncRNA genes and pseudogenes, to allow unambiguous communication, drawn from HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee.

name: SHR GeneIdentifierVS ValueSet
title: SHR GeneIdentifierVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: A unique code for a gene, including protein coding genes, ncRNA genes and pseudogenes, to allow unambiguous communication, drawn from HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee.
